Message:
I wiped my blade clean
and tossed it into the ocean...
Another job done.

Standing before the sea
in the dead of night,
I pulled out that silver coin.

What had caused me
immeasurable pain
to even look at in days past,
now evoked nothing within me.

In that case,
I should be able to
get rid of this coin.
But, why can’t I bear
to part with it?

They were the ones
who threw me away.
So, I should just...!

All of these
worthless sentiments,
memories...
this proof of a promise.
